description:
Kenshiro, Lin, and Bat arrive at a desert oasis. It`s a small but lively town, but it`s ruled by the "Divine Military," God`s Army, who on the surface protects the town while actually plundering its resources over and over again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Tehaisho. Nanatsu no Kizu no Ootoko o Nerae!
The Devil`s Hit List. Find the Man with the 7 Scars!
Une armée au service du mal
悪魔の手配書. 七つの傷の男を狙え!
